text: Haec autem sunt nomina uillarum qu<../images/etail.gif>pr<../images/etail.gif>fatus minister ipsi sancto deuotissime subegit monasterio.

Ærest Byrtun þe<../images/tbar.gif>mynster onstent, & Strættun, & Bromleage, & Bedintun, & Gageleage, & Witestun, & Langanford, & Styrcleage, & Niwantun æt þære wic, & Hwædedun, & oðer Niwantun, & Wineshylle, & Suðtun, & Tycenheale.

&<../images/tbar.gif>æt Scenctune, &<../images/tbar.gif>æt Halen, & Remesleage, &<../images/tbar.gif>æt Sciplea, &<../images/tbar.gif>æt Suþtune, &<../images/tbar.gif>æt <Actune>, twegra manna dæg, ealswa þa foreword sprecað.
&<../images/tbar.gif>æt Deorlafestune & Lege, mid eallon þan <þe> þær to hereð.
& Hilum Acofre mid eallon þam þe þærto hereð, & Bregdesheale, & Mortun, & eal seo socne þe þær to hereð.

& Pyllesleage, & Taþawyllan, & Æppelbyg, &<../images/tbar.gif>æt Burhtune, & æt Westtune, &<../images/tbar.gif>æt Wicgestane, &<../images/tbar.gif>æt Scearnforda, &<../images/tbar.gif>æt Ealdes wurðe, &<../images/tbar.gif>æt Ælfredingtune, &<../images/tbar.gif>æt Waddune, &<../images/tbar.gif>æt Snodeswic, &<../images/tbar.gif>æt Wynnefelda.

&<../images/tbar.gif>æt Oggodestune forð inn mid Mortune, &<../images/tbar.gif>æt Hereburgebyrig, &<../images/tbar.gif>æt Ecclesheale, &<../images/tbar.gif>æt Suðtune, &<../images/tbar.gif>æt Morleage.

þis is seo freols boc to þam mynstre æt Byrtune þe Æþelred cyning <æfre> ecelice gefreode gode to lofe & eallon his halgan to weorþunge swa swa Wulfric hit geedstaðelode for hine sylfne & <for> his yldrena sawla & hit mid munecon gesette<../images/tbar.gif>þær æfre inne þæs hades menn under heora abbude gode þeowian æfter <Sanctus> Benedictus tæcinge.sic fiat.

þus fela hyda sind in Offalawe hundred, in Bromlege .iii. hid'. Alrewæs .iii. hid', <Wicgintun> <&> Hopewæs .v. hid', Waleshale, & Wodnesbyri .ii. hid', Wilinhale .ii. hid', Fulcwipaginel .xviii. hid', Preostesland of Wulfrenehamtun .viii. hid', þe bisceop .xxv. hid', Elleford .iii. hid', Heorlauestun .iiii. hid', þorp .iii. hid', Cliftun .viii. hid', Siricescotan .ii. hid', Aclea .ii. hid', Hwiccenofre .ii. hid', Rideware þe uue reste ðder half hid', Rodberdes land .ix. hid', & an half, Se abbud of Byrtun .vi. hid', Scenstan .iiii. hid'.
